question: Who was Sarojini Naidu?
answer: Naidu; the first woman to become the governor of an Indian state served as the first governor of the United Provinces of Agra and Oudh from 1947 to 1949 and Sarojini Naidu was born in Hyderabad to Aghore Nath Chattopadhyay and Barada Sundari Debi on 13 February 1879.
